create new integer called pos with value 0
read variable a from the input
in a for loop , change i from 0 to length of a exclusive

print first pos - 1 elements of a
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < pos - 1 ; i ++ ) { cout << a [ i ] ; }

for i from 0 to pos exclusive , print a [ i ]
